Package com.aitusoftware.babl.proxy

Class ApplicationProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aitusoftware.babl.proxy.ApplicationProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Application
    public final class ApplicationProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Application
    IPC proxy to send messages to an application.

        public void init​(io.aeron.Publication applicationsPublication,
                 SessionAdapterStatistics sessionAdapterStatistics)
        Initialises the proxy with a publication.
        Parameters:
        applicationsPublication - publication to the application
        sessionAdapterStatistics - sink for metrics

      • onSessionConnected

        public int onSessionConnected​(Session session)
        Notification that a session has been created in the server. Implementations of this method should always return SendResult.OK.
        Specified by:
        onSessionConnected in interface Application
        Parameters:
        session - the newly connected session
        Returns:
        an indicator of success

      • onSessionDisconnected

        public int onSessionDisconnected​(Session session,
                                 DisconnectReason reason)
        Notification that a session has been disconnected in the server. Implementations of this method should always return SendResult.OK.
        Specified by:
        onSessionDisconnected in interface Application
        Parameters:
        session - the newly disconnected session
        reason - the reason for closing
        Returns:
        an indicator of success

      • onSessionMessage

        public int onSessionMessage​(Session session,
                            ContentType contentType,
                            org.agrona.DirectBuffer msg,
                            int offset,
                            int length)
        Called when a complete message is received from a web socket peer. Implementations of this method can use the return code to indicate if there is back-pressure experienced when attempting to send outbound messages back to the session.
        Specified by:
        onSessionMessage in interface Application
        Parameters:
        session - the session that received the message
        contentType - the content-type of the message
        msg - the content of the message
        offset - the message offset within the buffer
        length - the length of the message
        Returns:
        an indicator of success
